[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Echo {
        echo: Span(
            3,
            1,
        ),
        values: [
            Cast {
                span: Span(
                    3,
                    6,
                ),
                kind: String,
                value: Variable(
                    SimpleVariable(
                        SimpleVariable {
                            span: Span(
                                3,
                                15,
                            ),
                            name: "VAR",
                        },
                    ),
                ),
            },
        ],
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span(
                3,
                19,
            ),
        ),
    },
]
